text: Kare-ra wa, buzoku rengō-gun wa haitai shita node wa nai to kangaete iru. Moshi buzoku rengō-gun ga (futatabi) kuru koto ga areba, kare-ra wa bedō~in-zoku no ma ni mi o oite, anata gata no jōsokuwotazuneru (tachiba ni naru) koto o negatte iru. Mata moshi kare-ra ga anata gata no naka ni ite mo, wazuka no mono no soto wa tatakawanaidearou
